description.h2: The DTS of an instance must contain in each base set, for each source element, at most one effective relationship with an xlink:arcrole attribute equal to 'http://xbrl.org/int/dim/arcrole/all'.
description.p: A fact can always appear in more than one Table (hypercube), but this rule prevents a fact from having contradictory meanings in different Tables.

REMARK: This constraint does not take primary item inheritance into account, and therefore rules out the simplest uses of unions of 'all' hypercubes. A future release may take primary item inheritance into account and therefore implementors may wish to issue a warning in situations like that shown in variation 002gd.

variation.name: 6.16.5, Two all arcs with the same source in same base set, one (from 2008 rr) prohibited, GOOD.
variation.description: Two all arcs with the same source in same base set, one (from 2008 rr) prohibited, GOOD.

variation.name: 6.16.5, Two all arcs with the same source in same base set, NOGOOD.
variation.description: Element dei:EntityInformationLineItems is a primary element of more than one Table in relationship group 990 - Document - Other Information, ABC, to dei:EntityListingsTable in e61605001ng-20081231_def.xml, line 77, and to dei:EntitiesTable defined in e61605001ng-20081231_def.xml, line 59. NOGOOD.

variation.name: 6.16.5, A primary item has two all hypercubes, one inherited. GOOD.
variation.description: Primary item 'Statistics' has two 'all' hypercubes, one inherited from its domain-member parent. GOOD.
